mapper.update: UPDATE DHG_ROPL_AS SET UPR_NAM = #{data.uprNam, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_GRD = #{data.uprGrd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_TYP = #{data.uprTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_NUM = #{data.uprNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_FNC = #{data.uprFnc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_YMD = #{data.uprYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_STR = #{data.uprStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_END = #{data.uprEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_PA01 = #{data.uprPa01, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_PA02 = #{data.uprPa02, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_PA04 = #{data.uprPa04, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_PA06 = #{data.uprPa06, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_PA08 = #{data.uprPa08, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_PA10 = #{data.uprPa10, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UN01 = #{data.uprUn01, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UN02 = #{data.uprUn02, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UN04 = #{data.uprUn04, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UN06 = #{data.uprUn06, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UN08 = #{data.uprUn08, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UN10 = #{data.uprUn10, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UNOP = #{data.uprUnop, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_UNSE = #{data.uprUnse, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_WOK = #{data.uprWok, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_WID = #{data.uprWid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPR_SLE = #{data.uprSle, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_HGT = #{data.uprHgt, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_WKL = #{data.uprWkl, jdbcType=REAL}, UPR_WKR = #{data.uprWkr, jdbcType=REAL}, MNUM = #{data.mnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{data.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE FTR_IDN = #{ftrIdn}
